headline.main: NAZIS PUSH DEEPER IN NORTH CAUCASUS; Claim Don Passed on 150-Mile Front, With Some Spearheads 110 Miles to the South REPORT KUSCHEVKA TAKEN Fighting for Salsk Junction -Berlin Declares Russians Routed at River Bend

lead_paragraph: German, Rumanian and Slovak troops have crossed the lower Don River on a 150-mile front and have thrust spearheads 110 miles south of the river, the German High Command declared yesterday, according to Nazi broadcasts recorded by The Associated Press.
